pli-tv-pvr1.2:45.3: That is, one has obtained it. This interpretation is required by the fact that it is an offense entailing relinquishment.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:116.1: For an explanation of the idea of _vikappanā_, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:127.1: “Such things” and “that view” refer to _bhikkhu pācittiya_ 68, that is, the idea that sexual intercourse is not an obstacle to spiritual progress.
